nodes.text: The Koltine system was a Wild Space star system located within the Jahilid Drift region. It contained the world Koltine.

The Koltine system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace. Although the 2008 reference book The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia placed Koltine within the Jahilid Drift, which was stated to be an Outer Rim Territories region, The Essential Atlas placed the Koltine system in grid square L-21 as part of Wild Space instead.
